mapper.select: SELECT asrc.id, asrc.age_min, asrc.age_max, asrc.sex, asrc.rout, asrc.sick_risk_id FROM age_sick_risk_config asrc WHERE asrc.sick_risk_id = ${sick_risk_id} ORDER BY asrc.id DESC

SELECT asrc.id, asrc.age_min, asrc.age_max, asrc.sex, asrc.rout, asrc.sick_risk_id FROM age_sick_risk_config asrc WHERE asrc.age_min <= ${age} AND asrc.age_max >= ${age} AND asrc.sick_risk_id = ${sick_risk_id} ORDER BY asrc.id DESC
